card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Ajani, the Greathearted
card.text: Creatures you control have vigilance. +1: You gain 3 life. -2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

card.name: Arlinn's Wolf
card.text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
card.text: Each creature you control that's a Wolf or Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. -2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

card.name: Bolas's Citadel
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play the top card of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its converted mana cost rather than pay its mana cost. {T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

card.name: Dreadhorde Invasion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Emergence Zone
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as thought they had flash.

card.name: Flux Channeler
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
card.text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Ignite the Beacon
card.text: Search your library for up to to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Interplanar Beacon
card.text: Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

card.name: Invade the City
card.text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

card.name: Jace, Wielder of Mysteries
card.text: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. +1 Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card. -8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

card.name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card. +1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. -4: Each player sacrifices two creatures. -9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

card.name: No Escape
card.text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. Scry 1.

card.name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
card.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player. -2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

card.name: Paradise Druid
card.text: Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Ravnica at War
card.text: Exile all multicolored permanents.

card.name: Relentless Advance
card.text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.

card.name: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge
card.text: Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. +2: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life. -3: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. -8: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Put all artifact cards from among them onto the battlefield.

card.name: Tibalt, Rakish Instigator
card.text: Your opponents can't gain life. -2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "Whenever this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Tibalt's Rager
card.text: When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target. {1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Time Wipe
card.text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Vraska's Finisher
card.text: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Vraska, Swarm's Eminence
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. -2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

card.name: Widespread Brutality
card.text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
